quote_first: Aaron checked his watch on the run:
quote_last: . He prayed that Harry would be late. Harry was never late.
title: Cometh the Hour
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last:
[UNIT 4B, KING’S MILLS. (MUM IS MAKING ME SIT IN THE OFFICE BECAUSE SHE DOESN’T TRUST ME TO BE IN THE HOUSE ON MY OWN.)]
“Doctor, doctor, everyone thinks I’m a liar.”
“I find that hard to believe.”
title: The Book of Lies
author: Mary Horlock
